org.diet4j.core

Class Module

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.diet4j.core.Module

  • public class Module
extends Object
    A software Module. On an operating system level, this is usually called package.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Name of the run method on a class.

      The ModuleMeta for this Module.

      The parent ClassLoader of this Module's ClassLoader.

      The AbstractModuleRegistry in which this Module is registered.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Module

        public Module(ModuleMeta meta,
              AbstractModuleRegistry registry,
              ClassLoader parentClassLoader)
        Constructor. This should not be directly invoked by the application programmer.
        Parameters:
        meta - this Module's ModuleMeta
        registry - the registry of Modules in which we try to find dependent Modules
        parentClassLoader - the class loader of our parent Module

    • Method Detail

      • getModuleGroupId

        public final String getModuleGroupId()
        Obtain the groupId of this Module. It is the same as the groupId of its ModuleMeta.
        Returns:
        the groupId of this Module

      • getModuleArtifactId

        public final String getModuleArtifactId()
        Obtain the artifactId of this Module. It is the same as the artifactId of its ModuleMeta.
        Returns:
        the artifactId of this Module

      • getModuleVersion

        public final String getModuleVersion()
        Obtain the version of this Module. It is the same as the version of its ModuleMeta.
        Returns:
        the version of this Module

      • getModuleMeta

        public final ModuleMeta getModuleMeta()
        Obtain the ModuleMeta for this Module.
        Returns:
        the ModuleMeta for this Module

      • getModuleRegistry

        public final ModuleRegistry getModuleRegistry()
        Obtain the ModuleRegistry in which this Module has been registered.
        Returns:
        the ModuleRegistry in which this Module has been registered

      • determineDependencies

        public final Module[] determineDependencies()
        Convenience method to determine the dependent Modules of this Module.
        Returns:
        the dependent Modules

      • determineUses

        public final Module[] determineUses()
        Convenience method to determine the Modules that use this Module. This is the inverse relationship found by determineDependencies. However, unlike determineDependencies, the returned values may change dramatically during operation of the system as additional Modules become users.
        Returns:
        the set of Modules that this Module currently is used by

      • getClassLoader

        public final ClassLoader getClassLoader()
                                 throws MalformedURLException
        Obtain a ClassLoader that knows how to load the code belonging to this Module. This ClassLoader will delegate to the ClassLoader of the parent Module.
        Returns:
        this Module's ClassLoader
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - thrown if one of the URLs identifying the Module's JAR files is malformed

      • isActive

        public final boolean isActive()
        Determine whether this Module is active. A Module is active if it has been activated and not deactivated afterwards.
        Returns:
        if true, this Module is active

      • activateRecursively

        public final void activateRecursively()
                               throws ModuleResolutionException,
                                      ModuleNotFoundException,
                                      ModuleActivationException
        This recursively activates this Module. First, this method recursively activates all Modules that it this Module depends on, and then it activates itself.
        Throws:
        ModuleResolutionException - thrown if a dependent Module cannot be resolved
        ModuleNotFoundException - thrown if a dependent Module cannot be found
        ModuleActivationException - thrown if this Module, or a dependent Module could not be activated

      • activateRecursively

        public final void activateRecursively(ModuleActivator activator)
                               throws ModuleResolutionException,
                                      ModuleNotFoundException,
                                      ModuleActivationException
        This recursively activates this Module. First, this method recursively activates all Modules that it this Module depends on, and then it activates itself. By specifying a ModuleActivator, a non-standard way of activating the Module can be performed.
        Parameters:
        activator - a ModuleActivator instance that knows how to activate this Module
        Throws:
        ModuleResolutionException - thrown if a dependent Module cannot be resolved
        ModuleNotFoundException - thrown if a dependent Module cannot be found
        ModuleActivationException - thrown if this Module, or a dependent Module could not be activated

      • deactivateRecursively

        public final void deactivateRecursively()
                                 throws ModuleDeactivationException
        This recursively deactivates this Module. First, this method deactivates itself, and then it recursively activates all Modules that this Module depends on
        Throws:
        ModuleDeactivationException - throws if the Module could not be deactivated

      • deactivateRecursively

        public final void deactivateRecursively(ModuleActivator activator)
                                 throws ModuleDeactivationException
        This recursively deactivates this Module. First, this method deactivates itself, and then it recursively activates all Modules that this Module depends on. By specifying a ModuleActivator, a non-standard way of deactivating the Module can be performed.
        Parameters:
        activator - a ModuleActivator instance that knows how to deactivate instead of the default one specified in the ModuleMeta
        Throws:
        ModuleDeactivationException - throws if the Module could not be deactivated

      • getContextObject

        public final Object getContextObject()
        Obtain the context object returned by the activation method of this Module, if any.
        Returns:
        the context object, or null

      • run

        public final void run(String[] arguments)
               throws ClassNotFoundException,
                      ModuleRunException,
                      NoRunMethodException,
                      InvocationTargetException
        Run this Module as a root Module.
        Parameters:
        arguments - arguments to run, similar to the arguments of a standard main(...) method
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - thrown if the specified run class cannot be found
        ModuleRunException - thrown if the specified run method threw an Exception
        NoRunMethodException - thrown if a suitable run method cannot be found
        InvocationTargetException - thrown if the run method throws an Exception

      • run

        public int run(String overriddenRunClassName,
               String overriddenRunMethodName,
               String[] arguments)
        throws ClassNotFoundException,
               ModuleRunException,
               NoRunMethodException,
               InvocationTargetException
        Run this Module as a root Module. Specify a class to run other than the default, and/or a method other than the main() method.
        Parameters:
        overriddenRunClassName - optional name of the class to run instead of the default one specified in the ModuleMeta
        overriddenRunMethodName - optional name of the method in the class to run instead of the default one specified in the ModuleMeta
        arguments - arguments to run, similar to the arguments of a standard main(...) method
        Returns:
        the desired System exit code
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - thrown if the specified run class cannot be found
        ModuleRunException - thrown if the specified run method threw an Exception
        NoRunMethodException - thrown if a suitable run method cannot be found
        InvocationTargetException - thrown if the run method throws an Exception

      • getDefaultModuleActivator

        public ModuleActivator getDefaultModuleActivator()
        Obtain the default ModuleActivator for this Module.
        Returns:
        the ModuleActivator

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Object other)
        Determine Module equality. Two Modules are the same if they have the same Module Advertisement.
        Overrides:
        equals in class Object
        Parameters:
        other - other object to compare this Module to
        Returns:
        returns true if the objects are the same

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Determine hash code. We use the hash code of our ModuleMeta.
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class Object
        Returns:
        the hash code

      • toString

        public String toString()
        For debugging.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        string representation of this object
